definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: empty, idle talk (Ph. CIS:3, 6 listen not to [[בדנם]] = Heb. [[בַּדֵּיהֶם]]; cf bedho0 vain talk), esp. with collat. idea of imaginary pretensions or claims: Job 11:3 [[בַּדֶּיךָ]] [[מְתִים יַחֲרִישׁוּ]] thy idle talk brings men to silence (‖[[וַתִּלְעַג]]), Is 16:6 (of Moab) [[לאׁ כֵן בַּדָּיו]] his boastings are not right (unfounded), hence Je 48:30.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: concr. empty talkers, praters (cf. NH [[בַּדָּאָה]], Syr. boduwyo0, liar), of false prophets, Is 44:25, Je 50:36.
